body_html:
This is likely because your CPU does not support AVX instructions. Since TensorFlow 1.6 the release binaries are compiled with AVX support and running those instructions on CPUs that do not support it will result in this error.

@gunan may know if we are working on detecting this and writing out an error message. However, in the mean time you'll probably have to build from source or using unofficial builds like those mentioned in https://github.com/yaroslavvb/tensorflow-community-wheels

Hope that helps!
